channel.title: Comments on: New My Bloody Valentine music by year’s end?

item.title: By: B.McDowell
item.dc:creator: B.McDowell
item.description: This cant be real. I have heard so many rumors, just like this one, About MBV through the years. None of them were true, And this one isnt either
item.content:encoded: This cant be real. I have heard so many rumors, just like this one, About MBV through the years. None of them were true, And this one isnt either

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: First, Hayden Panties-I-Tare as Wendy, then The Smiths thing you told me the other night, now this. My feeble little heart just can't take this kind of thing. I hope so, regardless. Jesus H. Christ...I gettin' hard just thinking about it.
item.content:encoded: First, Hayden Panties-I-Tare as Wendy, then The Smiths thing you told me the other night, now this. My feeble little heart just can’t take this kind of thing. I hope so, regardless. Jesus H. Christ…I gettin’ hard just thinking about it.
